Description: OTC IS RESPONSIBLE FOR FACILITATING COLLABORATION AMONG THE OTC JURISDICTIONS, NOTABLY THE STATE ENVIRONMENTAL COMMISSIONERS/ SECRETARIES AND STATE AIR DIRECTORS AND THEIR STAFF, TO ASSIST THEM IN REDUCING OZONE PRECURSOR EMISSIONS IN THEIR STATES AND IN REPRESENTING THEIR OZONE-RELATED ISSUES TO THE EPA. THE FOCUS OF OTC TECHNICAL AND POLICY EFFORTS ARE TO ENSURE REAL RESULTS IN AIR QUALITY IMPROVEMENTS IN THE OTR.
